page.title: J.M. Smucker Disappoints, Sales Flat
page.text: CHICAGO (Reuters) - J.M. Smucker Co. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=SJM.N target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">SJM.N</A> on Friday posted an 18.5 percent rise in quarterly profit, but its shares fell as much as 5 percent as sales were nearly flat excluding an acquisition.
